backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI/UX revamp requirements, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of all frontend components and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark mode tokens, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Semantic HTML entry file with SEO meta tags and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing header, all marketing sections, and footer into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: CTA section with gradient design, email form, and trust badges wrapped in SectionShell.
Renders the hero marketing section with headline, CTAs, trust indicators, and stat cards, including smooth scrolling to contact and services sections.
Displays a four-step marketing process with icons and descriptions using cards.
Shows metrics and achievements in a grid layout with icons to build trust.
Wraps marketing sections with consistent background variants and layout styling.
Lists six service offerings with icons, descriptions, features, and a CTA in card format.
Renders client testimonials with ratings, quotes, and avatar details.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteFo: Footer with brand block, multi-column links, social icons, and dynamic year handling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteHe: Sticky responsive header with scroll effects, navigation, CTAs, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks with no current implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables, typography, focus styles, and custom utility/component classes including color tokens and layout helpers.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a cn helper that merges conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme tokens mapped to CSS variables, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and requirements for revamping the AMS Digital Agency UI/UX to match SEO Sherpa's style.
